title: anbAna uLLattil
sahitya:
anbAna uLLattil Ananda sangItam aLLip-parugiDuvOm ulagIrE


anupallavi

  tunbattait-taNittiDum tUya cidAnandam donda bandhamillAda sutantarAnandamE


caraNam    pErinba vINaiyirp-piranda nAdAnandam piLLaiyin mazhalaiyirp-pEshum jIvAnandam
kArinba vAnattirk-kATTum karuNAnandam kalaiyaik-kaDanda yOga nilai sEr paramAnandam
